lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: When Jesus got out of the boat, who came to meet him?
answers: A man with an evil spirit

questions.text: How did the evil spirit make this man's life miserable?
answers: Lived among tombs, cut himself, broke chains, screamed

questions.text: When Jesus said, 'Come out of this man, spirit!', what did the man shout?
What was the evil spirit's name?
What did the evil spirits beg Jesus to let them do?
answers: Go into a herd of pigs

questions.text: What happened to the pigs when the evil spirits entered them?
answers: Ran into the water and drowned

questions.text: What happened to the man when the evil spirits left him?
What did the townspeople ask Jesus to do?
answers: Leave because they were afraid of him
Bring the pigs back to life

questions.text: What did the man ask Jesus?
answers: He wanted to leave with Jesus

questions.text: What did Jesus tell the man to do?
answers: Go tell the people of his town what God did for him
Fetch the pigs from the water
